altername_name: Katekyoo Hitman Reborn! DS: Vongola Shiki: Taisen Battle Sugoroku
name: Katekyoo Hitman Reborn! Bongole Shiki Taisen Battle Sugoroku
overview: Katekyoo Hitman Reborn! Bongole Shiki Taisen Battle Sugoroku is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Takara Tomy, which was released in Japan in 2008.
